entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 19 January 2023
